death.attack.amalgam_damage.item: %1$s's skull was crushed by the Hybrid
advancements.collect_crimson_flame.title: Bottled Up
item.hybrid_vx.amalgam_config_tooltip_it: a random number is generated between min and max for the spawn time. §3the min default is 60 and the max default is 240§f, the spawn numbers are in seconds so set how many seconds you want it to take for the hybrid to spawn on min and max. §6Warning: do not set max time lower than min time otherwise it will cause bugs or crash the game
the hybrid chase music just toggles on and off the music for when the hybrid is chasing you. §3the default is "true" which means the box default is checked
the hybrid mftf ai spawn sound just toggles on and off whether you hear the hybrid spawn when his ai is similar to the mftf. §3the default is "true" which means the box default is checked
death.attack.amalgam_damage.player: %1$s's head was torn off by the Hybrid
item.hybrid_vx.amalgam_config_tooltip_it: the can have panic attacks just toggles on and off whether you can have panic attacks in the game. §3the default is "true" which means the box default is checked
the hallucination jumpscare just toggles on and off whether you get get jumpscared by the hallucinations. §3the default is "true" which means the box default is checked

a random number is generated between 0 and the number that you can set for the spawn chance, if the number is = to 1 then the hybrid will spawn. §3the default is 2§f, if you want a higher chance of the hybrid spawning set the spawn chance to a lower number, if you want a lower chance for the hybrid to spawn set the spawn chance to a higher number. §6Warning: do not set this number below 1 otherwise it may cause bugs or crash the game
advancements.vile_creature.title: Vile Creature
death.attack.amalgam_damage: %1$s's intenstines were ripped out by the Hybrid
advancements.collect_crimson_flame.descr: Capture a Crimson Flame in a bottle
item.hybrid_vx.amalgam_config_warning_it: §6Warning: Pressing "Done" without setting everything as you want it will result in some things being reset to default and if all the checkboxes are unchecked than they will all be false
